title: Singapore - Medical Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Letter from Singapore Hospital or Medical Institution.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport(s) and minimum validity of the passport must be 6 months from the date of travel..
2 copies of recent color photos sized 35x45 mm Matt Paper white background (Cap & Glass Photos not allowed).
Bank statement of last 6 months and bank solvency certificate (Original seal signed copy and a set of photocopies).
Marriage Certificate Notarized and English translated copy ( If Spouse name not mentioned in Passport).
Bangladeshi Doctor Recommendation Latter & Previous medical report.
Additional specific documents for specific occupation.
